name: I Can't Sleep In Silence - It's Always Darkest
name_original: I Can't Sleep In Silence - It's Always Darkest
description:
September 30th 2008.

It's been three months since 'The Abacus Killer' claimed his first victim. The only clue, the figure 8 painted by the body.

Since then he's claimed a further two victims, each time a number left at the scene, counting down - but to what?

DCI Warren Blake - over worked and under pressure is called to the scene of a further murder - has Abacus claimed a fourth victim?

This horror themed point and click adventure game (classic Sierra Lucasarts style) set in modern day England and with Noir overtones acts as the prologue to the upcoming 'I Can't Sleep In Silence' series
